text: Chrislehurston is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== The suburb is situated on part of an old Witwatersrand farm called Syferfontein. It was established in 1958 and was named after Chislehurst, Kent. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Chislehurston
